casebody.data:
State
v.
William Edward Godwin, III 167PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2016.

Mr. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, For Godwin, William Edward (III).

Ms. Teresa L. Townsend, Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of December 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 11th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
